query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_device_positions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  floor_plan_id INT NOT NULL,
  zone_id INT,
  position_x INT NOT NULL,
  position_y INT NOT NULL,
  rotation INT DEFAULT 0,
  icon_size INT DEFAULT 32,
  icon_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'default',
  label_position ENUM('top','bottom','left','right','none') DEFAULT 'bottom',
  show_label INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  show_status INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  custom_icon VARCHAR(500),
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_device_pos_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_device_pos_floor (floor_plan_id),
  INDEX idx_device_pos_zone (zone_id)
);

  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  floor_plan_id INT NOT NULL,
  zone_id INT,

  position_y INT NOT NULL,
  rotation INT DEFAULT 0,
  icon_size INT DEFAULT 32,
  icon_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'default',
  label_position ENUM('top','bottom','left','right','none') DEFAULT 'bottom',
  show_label INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  show_status INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  custom_icon VARCHAR(500),
  metadata JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_device_pos_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_device_pos_floor (floor_plan_id),
  INDEX idx_device_pos_zone (zone_id)
);
